tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_indicator_category; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_category AS SELECT con.activity_id amp_activity_id, ic.category_value, ic.id AS amp_category_class_id, ind.indicator_id AS me_indicator_id, si.amp_sector_id AS me_indicator_sector_id, con.ind_val_category AS me_indicator_logframe_id, con.risk AS me_indicator_risk_id FROM amp_indicator_connection con JOIN amp_indicator ind ON ind.indicator_id = con.indicator_id LEFT JOIN amp_sector_indicator si ON ind.indicator_id = si.indicator_id join amp_category_value ic on ind.indicators_category=ic.id WHERE con.sub_clazz :: TEXT = 'a' :: TEXT;
